Title: No Longer Just Us
Writer: Stephen Falk (created by), Stephen Falk, Franklin Hardy, Shane Kosakowski, Philippe Iujvidin (staff writer)
Actors: Chris Geere, Aya Cash, Desmin Borges, Kether Donohue
Plot: Jimmy and Gretchen investigate a murder site. Lindsay sees a new side of Paul. Edgar makes a sacrifice with unforeseen consequences.
